doc.title: ieatishootipost wins "Best Asian Weblog" at the 10th Bloggies Awards
doc.text: Ieatishootipost/PRP has/VB won/VB ``/JJ Best/NN Asian/NN Weblog/NN ''/NN at/IN the/DT 1oth/NNP Annual/NNP Bloggies/NNP Awards/NNP !/. Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO everyone/VB who/WP logged/VBN in/IN to/TO support/VB the/DT blog/NN !/.
